features: Introducing BST AXN XL! Designed for those larger-than-life characters from the TMNT lore so you can scale up and re-enact your favorite TMNT story elements with your 1:15th scale (5-inch) TMNT BST AXN collection! Sold Separately.
Krang is complete with his menacing giant man-baby, pinhead 8-inch robot wearing metallic lederhosen ready to wreak havoc on all of us.
Krang’s robot is ready for action with 31 points of articulation for maximum posing and play.
Krang comes with an extra set of interchangeable tentacle arms.
Krang’s robot comes with an axe, a drill, a laser weapon, a huge katana sword and punching fists & gripping hands.
body.description: Introducing BST AXN XL! Designed for those larger-than-life characters from the TMNT lore to scale up so YOU can re-enact your favorite TMNT story elements with your 1:15th scale TMNT BST AXN collection! Krang is 8" tall and is packed with features; a snap and release cockpit accessed through the waist, housing Krang in the control pit of his AWESOME robot! Krang comes with an extra set of tentacle arms with ball and pin joints for maximum poseability. Krang's robot comes with several interchangeable hand grips and weapons - an axe, a drill, a laser weapon, a huge katana sword, punching fists, and gripping hands! Krang robot features 31 pts of articulation including butterfly joints in the shoulder, and double joints in both elbows, and knees for maximum poseability! A must have for the TMNT enthusiast - fully poseable, killer quality, killer features, a ton of accessories! Packaged in a great display window-box! The first in the BST AXN XL assortment, 8" TMNT action figures, here we come!"

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All the feels, and then some! Pulling your hair out on the simplicity and lack of detail in the 3” and 4” action figure variety? Can’t seem to find the space for all those bulky, expensive 6” action figures? Want something uniform, as if all the figures are fighting for universal supremacy in a scale that feels good? Do you love anime, nostalgia, and music, but feel your interests have been under-represented at retail? We have the perfect solution for you: BST AXN! A 5”, highly detailed, highly articulated action figure! Finally: scale, detail, articulation, character range, and all the accessories to meet your action figure collecting needs!

Want the BST FEATURES? Each figure comes with an additional head portrait, multiple accessories, and the best sculpt and paint in the business! Customize, play, and display to your heart’s content! Need the BST ARTICULATION? Each figure features 31 points of articulation, swivel bicep and thigh joints, double knee, shoulder, and elbow joints, as well as ball joints for maximum poseability! Gotta have the BST ASSORTMENT? We have all your favorites from all of pop culture, including TMNT, music, movies, and anime!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love Krang
reviews.reviewText: Krang was one of my favorite parts of the TMNT universe. As a kid, I always wanted the original android body for Krang. Unfortunately it was pretty hard to find and was a bit pricey for the time. Nowadays the original goes for upwards of $200+ and I was always disappointed by the scale of the original, which seemed very oversized compared to the other TMNT figures.I just happened to stumble across this version of Krang's Android Body by Loyal Subjects and immediately had to have it! I didn't even know this was coming out but the sculpt, features, and XL size hypnotized me with it's Utrom powers! It not only looks great but it fits perfectly among my old school Ninja Turtle toys!The $30 price tag seems perfect for this figure! This is a lovingly crafted product which can be equally described as a collectible or a play thing. I may end up buying a second one for my kids to play with!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely one of the cooler TMNT figures I have ever had
reviews.reviewText: First, this thing is freaking huge, and it is heavy. That's in no way a bad thing though, the weight definitely helps make it so he won't topple on the shelf. Also has a ton of cool swap out weapons to replace both hands which is a nice touch. The figure also comes with a removable Krang, which sits inside the chest cavity by cracking the entire figure in half, pulling his tentacles off, and sitting him inside. That's also one of the complaints I have about this set though, while he's sitting inside they designed it so that he has a smaller set of tentacles that are operating the controls of the suit, and those are non-removable, so if you want to have it posed so that he is outside of the suit it does look a little weird that he still has disembodied tentacles wrapped around the controls. Also, the antenna forks on top of his head are made from a really soft plastic, and on mine they arrived kind of bent over and laying flat against the top of his head instead of pointing up. Not necessarily a deal breaker, but still something worth noting. Overall, definitely an awesome looking figure and worth picking up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not terrible for the price
reviews.reviewText: The Loyal subjects TMNT toy line is pretty cheap and of terrible quality, that being said this figure is the exception to me. It doesn't seem as cheap as the other figures in the line, and I feel is worth the $30 I paid for it. Looks good on the shelf!

reviews.reviewText: Excellent detail. Excellent materials used in manufacturing. Tmnt cartoon accurate. Good weight and feel . Posable and plays well . Excellent quality. I ordered it for my son as a Christmas gift, he loves it . Perfect for play or for collecting

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Body Eclectic
reviews.reviewText: Really great figure for the money. If I had any complaints, it'd be that once inside the body, Krang just kind of sits in there and can't really be pushed down on the little oval he sits on

reviews.reviewTitle: Necesita más movimiento en las piernas
reviews.reviewText: Todo bien por parte de amazon, la figura tiene buenos accesorios, gran tamaño y aspecto pero esta un poco limitado de las piernas, esto no deja posarlo bien
pleased with this Krang, one of the bst in the loyal subjects tmnt line.
Sin duda una excelente figura de krang con piezas intercambiables que le dan un gran toque, yo lo compre para mi hijo, pero en realidad puede estar en cualquier colección y a un excelente precio
